description:
Under the "Perfect Sleep" law, you are not allowed to go out at night on the planet Town without Night. There, Tetsuro gets into a scuffle with a group of men hoping to get a shot of the kind monster Heron, and the police are called. He`s taken in by the police and it looks like he won`t make it back in time to board the 999. Then, Heron appears once again...
Source: crunchyroll
